1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Relmap operators for time type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Type.Time
6  ( ropsTypeTime,
7    -- * add-time
8    consAddTime, relmapAddTime, relkitAddTime,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus          as K
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base          as Rop
14
15-- | Implementation of relational operators.
16ropsTypeTime :: (K.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
17ropsTypeTime = Rop.rops "type"
18    [ consAddTime
19      K.& [ "add-time /N -year E -month E [-day E] [-clock E]"
20            K.& "-time . -year -month -day? -clock?" ]
21    ]
22
23
24-- ----------------------  time
25
26-- | [add-time \/c -year /Y/ -month /M/ -day /D/]
27--     Add term \/c as a time of /Y/-/M/-/D/.
28
29consAddTime :: (K.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
30consAddTime med =
31    do cops   <- Rop.getLetR     med
32       n      <- Rop.getTerm     med "-time"
33       year   <- Rop.getCox      med "-year"
34       month  <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-month"
35       day    <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-day"
36       clock  <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-clock"
37       Right $ relmapAddTime med (cops, n, (year, month, day, clock))
38
39-- | Create @time@ relmap.
40relmapAddTime :: (K.CContent c) =>
41  C.Intmed c -> (K.CopSet c, K.TermName, (K.Cox c, K.MaybeCox c, K.MaybeCox c, K.MaybeCox c)) -> C.Relmap c
42relmapAddTime med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitAddTime
43
44-- | Create @time@ relkit.
45relkitAddTime :: (K.CContent c)
46  => (K.CopSet c, K.TermName, (K.Cox c, K.MaybeCox c, K.MaybeCox c, K.MaybeCox c))
47  -> C.RelkitFlow c
48relkitAddTime _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
49relkitAddTime (cops, n, (year, month, day, clock)) (Just he1) = kit where
50    pk     = K.termPicker [n] he1
51    he2    = n `K.headCons` he1
52    kit    = Rop.newCheck pk $ Right $ C.relkitLineAb False he2 f
53    f cs1  = do let run = K.calcCox cops he1 cs1
54                y <- getInteger $ run year
55                m <- getMaybe (getInt . run) month
56                d <- getMaybe (getInt . run) day
57                c <- getMaybe (K.getClock . run) clock
58                time <- timeFrom y m d c
59                Right $ K.pTime time : cs1
60
61timeFrom :: Integer -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe K.Clock -> K.Ab K.Time
62timeFrom y (Just m) (Just d) (Just c)    = do date <- K.ymdDate y m d
63                                              Right $ K.timeSetClock c $ K.dTime date
64timeFrom y (Just m) (Just d) (Nothing)   = K.dTime <$> K.ymdDate y m d
65timeFrom y (Just m) (Nothing) (Nothing)  = K.dTime <$> K.ymDate y m
66timeFrom _ _ _ _ = K.bug "timeFrom"
67
68getMaybe :: (c -> K.Ab a) -> Maybe c -> K.Ab (Maybe a)
69getMaybe f (Just c)  = return . Just =<< f c
70getMaybe _ _         = return Nothing
71
72getInt :: (K.CContent c) => K.Ab c -> K.Ab Int
73getInt c = do d <- K.getDec c
74              return $ fromInteger $ K.decimalNum d
75
76getInteger :: (K.CContent c) => K.Ab c -> K.Ab Integer
77getInteger c = do i <- getInt c
78                  return $ toInteger i
79
